title: 2.5 bath HUGE Double Master Bedroom Town Home w/ Private Patio
neighborhood: Inner Loop / Highland Village / Galleria / Afton Oaks
posting_body: Great quiet location near Galleria in Afton Oaks!
Open-concept downstairs, with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking expansive shaded patio with surrounding garden area.
Kitchen, with pantry and lots of cabinets, includes fridge with external cold water dispenser.
Upstairs are 2 spacious primary bedrooms, each with its own large closet.
Two full bathrooms with original tile work.
Work from home or enjoy easy commutes because you're living inside the Loop, making travel access a breeze.
Located amongst beautiful multimillion-dollar homes, where walking your dog will be so relaxing under shaded tree canopies.
Near many restaurants, shopping, and museums.
Easy access to universities and businesses via 610 or 59.
Utility room with washer/dryer is steps away and available anytime for residents of this townhouse triplex.
